      • setClickHandler

        void setClickHandler(IScriptFunction func)
        Sets the script function to automatically call when the button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        func - The click handler function, or null to disable automatic click handling.
        See Also:
        consumePress()

      • getTouchMargin

        double getTouchMargin()
        See Also:
        setTouchMargin(double)

      • setTouchMargin

        void setTouchMargin(double p)
        Adds some padding to the area in which mouse/touch presses are considered to be 'inside' the button. The main use for this function is to make buttons easier to press on small touchscreen devices.
        Parameters:
        p - The amount of padding to add to each side of the button.
